SELECT t.id id, t.contract_id contractId, t.seq_no seqNo, t.bespoke_date bespokeDate, t.acc_no accNo, t.trade_amount tradeAmount, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime, t.mchn_child mchnChild, t.bespoke_date bespokedate, t.trade_state tradetate, t.real_trade_amount realTradeAmount
FROM t_gq_fss_trade_apply t where t.apply_type=11091001
and t.contract_id like concat('%',#{contractId},'%')
and t.seq_no like concat('%',#{seqNo},'%')
and t.mchn_child like concat('%',#{mchnChild},'%')
AND 1=1
AND t.create_time BETWEEN #{creatTime} AND SYSDATE()
AND t.create_time BETWEEN #{creatTime} AND #{modifyTime}
AND t.create_time < #{modifyTime}
